source.88783a21:
#LASSO 
reg=LassoCV()
reg.fit(X,y)
coef=pd.Series(reg.coef_,index=X.columns)
imp_coef=coef.sort_values()
matplotlib.rcParams['figure.figsize']=(8.0,10.0)
imp_coef.plot(kind='barh')
plt.title('Important features using LASSO')
